attributes.action: social services and doctors more education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Social services and doctors need to be better educated in abuse and neglect so that another baby p is not put through such a  cruel , evil torture without being noticed by both social workers and doctors .We put our trust in these people and poor baby p was alone when they could have easily saved him from this . I hope they all can live with themselves after there neglect. We need to put something inplace so that these proffessional people can rescue more abused children and babies. please sign so we can try and make a difference

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
